bill.title: Highway Safety; Photo Speed Imaging; Appropriation
bill.description: Establishes a photo speed imaging detector system program. Authorizes counties to administer the program. Requires proceeds of fines to be expended in the county from which they were collected for generation of the program. Appropriates funds. Effective January 7, 2059. (HB2789 HD1)

history.action: (H) Referred to TRN, JUD, FIN, referral sheet 9
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by TRN on Wednesday, 02-01-12 9:00AM in House conference room 309.

(H) The committees on TRN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) Souki, Ichiyama, Aquino, Cullen, M. Lee, Luke, Saiki, Takumi, Yamashita, Fontaine, Johanson; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Okamura.
(H) Reported from TRN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 130-12), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to JUD.

(H) Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on JUD with Representative(s) Ching, Marumoto, Pine, Riviere voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Thielen voting no (1) and Representative(s) Takai excused (1).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by JUD on Thursday, 02-09-12 2:00PM in House conference room 325.

(H) The committees on JUD recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 11 Ayes: Representative(s) Keith-Agaran, Rhoads, Brower, Carroll, Herkes, Luke, McKelvey, Tsuji, Fontaine; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Ito, Marumoto; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Thielen; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) Cabanilla, Coffman, Souki.
(H) Reported from JUD (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 637-12) as amended in HD 1, recommending referral to FIN.

(H) Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 1 with Representative(s) Ching, Hanohano, C. Lee, Marumoto, Pine, Riviere voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Thielen voting no (1) and Representative(s) Herkes, Kawakami, M. Lee, Mizuno, Morikawa excused (5).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 02-24-12 11:00AM in House conference room 308.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 15 Ayes: Representative(s) Oshiro, M. Lee, Choy, Cullen, Giugni, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, Kawakami, C. Lee, Morikawa, Yamashita, Ward; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Marumoto; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Riviere; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Tokioka.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 764-12), recommending passage on Third Reading.

(H) Passed Third Reading with Representative(s) Aquino, Ching, Giugni, Hanohano, Johanson, Morikawa voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Belatti, Cullen, C. Lee, Marumoto, Nishimoto, Pine, Riviere, Takai, Thielen, Wooley, Yamane voting no (11) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
